title: Turn Off Lights
description: Turn off lights when leaving a room.

title: Bring Your Own Bag
description: Use a reusable bag instead of a plastic one when shopping.

title: Walk or Cycle
description: Choose walking or cycling for a short trip instead of using a car.

title: Unplug Devices
description: Unplug electronics when they are not in use.

title: Use a Refillable Water Bottle
description: Ditch single-use plastic bottles and use a refillable water bottle.

title: Shorter Showers
description: Take a shower that lasts no more than 5 minutes.

title: Use Both Sides of Paper
description: Write or print on both sides of the paper.

title: Eat Local
description: Choose one meal made with locally-sourced ingredients.

title: Say No to Straws
description: Avoid using single-use plastic straws for a day.

title: Turn Down the Heat
description: Lower your thermostat by 1 degree to save energy.

title: Wash in Cold Water
description: Do your laundry with cold water to save energy.

title: Recycle Properly
description: Ensure all recyclable items are clean and sorted correctly.

title: Replace Lightbulbs
description: Replace one incandescent bulb with an LED.

title: Use Public Transportation
description: Take a bus, train, or shared vehicle instead of driving.

title: Bring Your Own Cup
description: Bring a reusable cup for your coffee or tea.

title: Air Dry Clothes
description: Skip the dryer and air-dry your clothes today.

title: Use a Bar of Soap
description: Switch to a bar of soap to reduce plastic waste.

title: Share a Ride
description: Carpool with friends or coworkers for a trip.

title: Go Paperless
description: Opt for digital receipts and statements.

title: Skip the Elevator
description: Use the stairs instead of the elevator.

title: Reuse Packaging
description: Reuse a box or package for storage or another purpose.

title: Avoid Prepackaged Foods
description: Choose fresh or bulk foods to reduce packaging waste.

title: Donate Old Items
description: Give away items you no longer use instead of throwing them out.

title: Fix Something
description: Repair a broken item instead of discarding it.

title: Close Doors and Windows
description: Keep doors and windows closed while the AC or heat is on.

title: Meal Plan
description: Plan your meals to reduce food waste.

title: Use Cloth Towels
description: Replace paper towels with reusable cloth ones.

title: Download Instead of Stream
description: Download media instead of streaming to save energy.

title: Conserve Water
description: Turn off the tap while brushing your teeth.

title: Recycle Electronics
description: Drop off old electronics at a recycling facility.

title: Take Public Transportation
description: Use public transit instead of driving your car today.
